description: CSS file defining styles and variables for theme management in the Tic Tac Toe frontend application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class styling for layout, theming, and basic animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the application, including layout and background colors.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styling for toggling themes, including hover and active states.
